Voucher.title: Voucher
Voucher.description: Represents a discount voucher for orders.

code.description: The unique code for the voucher.

discountValue.description: The value of the discount (either percentage or fixed amount).

startDate.description: The start date of the voucher's validity.

expiryDate.description: The expiration date of the voucher.

isActive.description: Whether the voucher is currently active.

usageCount.description: How many times the voucher has been used.

usageLimit.description: The maximum number of times the voucher can be used.

minPurchase.description: The minimum purchase amount to be eligible for the voucher.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents a customer order for a product.

customerName.description: Name of the customer placing the order.

productId.description: Reference to the Product. (Relationship: Product 1:N Order)

orderDate.description: Date and time when the order was placed.

price.description: The price of the order at the time of purchase.

userId.description: The ID of the user who placed the order.

status.description: The current status of the order.

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a portfolio website template available for purchase.

headline.description: The main headline for the product's landing page.

description.description: Detailed description of the template features and benefits.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image showcasing the template.

features.description: List of key features offered by the template.

active.description: Whether the product is active and visible to customers.

LandingPage.title: Landing Page Content
LandingPage.description: Editable content for the main landing page.

heroHeadline.description: The main headline in the hero section.

heroSubheadline.description: The sub-headline in the hero section.

referrerName.description: Name of the person who made the referral.

referrerId.description: The user ID of the referrer.

referredEmail.description: Email of the person who was referred.

referralDate.description: The date the referral was made.

commission.description: The commission amount earned from this referral.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to address the reported Firestore error and support the application's features. The main collections are `products`, `orders`, and `landingPage`. The `orders` collection stores order information, with each order document referencing a `product` by `productId`. The `landingPage` collection holds editable content for the public-facing site. This flat structure simplifies security rules and queries. Products and landing page content are publicly readable and admin-writable. Orders are listable by admins, and can only be created by the authenticated user who owns them.
